detectors.description:
Unipool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#613-628) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#619)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#622)

detectors.description:

		- uni.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#530)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#475)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#601)
		- dos.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#608)

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#601)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#552)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#601)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#551)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#601)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#607)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#554)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#601)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#555)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#399-405):
	- (success) = recipient.call.value(amount)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#403)

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#242-244)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#261-264)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__12.sol#270-274)
